page.title: 12FARMING IN THE BLOCK
page.content: THERE ARE THREE MAIN TYPES OF AGRICULTURAL ACTIVITY IN THE BLOCK, ALL RELATED TO THE GEOLOGY AND LANDSCAPE. ON EITHER SIDE OF THE RIVER YEO ON THE FLAT LOW-LYING LAND CATTLE ARE REARED ON THE RICH PASTURE. ON EITHER SIDE OF THAT AREA THERE IS A MIXTURE OF ROUGH AND CULTIVATED GRASSLAND WITH A SMALL AMOUNT OF ARABLE CULTIVATION. THIS AREA IS ALSO MARKED BY ITS THICK HEDGEROWS AND OCCASIONAL CLUMPS OF TREES TO THE NORTH, FRINGING THE WOODLAND AND SOMETIMES IN WOODLAND CLEARINGS THERE IS MORE ARABLE CULTIVATION, BUT STILL A PREDOMINANCE OF PASTURE AND CATTLE. JUDGING FROM THE NUMBER OF EXPENSIVE CARS IN THE FARMYARDS IT MUST BE REASONABLY PROFITABLE TO FARM THE AREA.
